Abstrak: Focuses on the "Impression: Painting Quickly in France, 1860-1890," exhibition at the Clark Art Institute in Williamstown, Massachusetts. Spontaneity of Impressionist paintings; Probes on the look of "painting quickly" as an essential characteristic of Modernist painting; Consideration of the complexity of the achievement of Impressionism.
Sumber: Hudson Review. Autumn2001, Vol. 54 Issue 3, p446-454. 9p
